sentences.sContent: The report caused needless anxiety to women who have attended the clinic.
sentences.sCn: 那份报告让去那家诊所就诊过的妇女产生了不必要的忧虑。

sentences.sContent: We need to bring to an end these needless deaths.
sentences.sCn: 我们必须终止这些无谓的死亡。
查尔斯痛恨不必要的浪费。

trans.tranOther: needless troubles, suffering, loss etc are unnecessary because they could easily have been avoided
